title: Birthstone

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the ability of a rock role that is named after a birthstone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain the attributes of the role who's ability you use for the night you use the ability, then you lose the attributes.
- You may not use the same role twice in a row, unless it is the birthstone for the current month.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Rocks.

desc:
Post 4795
*The roles I'm making just keep getting lazier and lazier...*
